contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner is:
(1) Did the court illegally sentence [Aikens] on unlawful contact with a minor graded as an F-l when it should have been graded as an F-3?
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
